item.title: Q3 FY2026 Earnings Review: Mixed Results Across Market Caps with Mid Caps Leading Profit Growth
item.description: The September 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a mixed bag of results across market capitalisation segments, revealing nuanced sectoral performances and a modest improvement in aggregate profitability. While mid-cap companies have demonstrated robust earnings growth, large caps continue to face headwinds, underscoring the divergent trajectories within the Indian equity landscape. Time: 30 minutes ago

item.title: Emcure Pharmaceuticals Downgraded to Hold Amid Mixed Technical and Valuation Signals
item.description: Emcure Pharmaceuticals Ltd has seen its investment rating downgraded from Buy to Hold as of 6 January 2026, reflecting a nuanced reassessment across quality, valuation, financial trends, and technical indicators. Despite robust quarterly financials and strong management efficiency, evolving technical signals and valuation concerns have tempered enthusiasm among analysts, prompting a more cautious stance on the stock. Time: 59 minutes ago
